item.title: Raconteur Careers
item.content:
This site is an internal project for my current employer Raconteur. The
design features a lot of advanced features, that were quite challenging
to develop. The site was built with React, Gatsby and Contentful, as well
as Styled-Components for CSS in JS styling and React-Spring for light
animations.
